name: Rodina Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Rodina Soundtrack by John Robert Matz!
  • 20 tracks, including planetary and orbit themes for all 4 planets
  • Over 1 hour of music MP3 and ALAC formats
  • 1 bonus variation track not used in the original game!

Brendan's note: "The Rodina soundtrack exceeded my every expectation. John Robert is a humble genius - an artitst who takes your concepts and brings them to life in a way you could never have imagined. Rodina came alive because of his talent. I never get tired of this music!"
